Welcome To Brain2Speech
By the UBC HCT Lab
Tell Me More

Brain2Speech

Communication is a basic human activity to exchange information with each other. In particular, speaking is the easiest and the most straightforward way to communicate. With the Brain2Speech project, the Human Communications Technologies Lab at UBC is currently investigating new methods to control an advanced 3D biomechanical articulatory speech synthesis using neural activation-based models.
